contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
Lesson 13 福利待遇 Benefits
场景对话
杰克在向面试官比尔先生询问福利待遇情况。
Bill: Jack, you should have known in general the situation of our company now.
比尔：杰克，现在你应该已经大致了解我们公司的情况了。
Jack: Yes, and I am very satisfi ed with it.
Bill: Do you have any other questions?
比尔：你还有什么问题吗？
Jack: Would you please tell me about fringe benefi ts of the company?
职场达人小技巧    福利待遇的相关内容    面试时，除了一般的工资待遇外，我们还需要了解公司的福利待遇，比如奖金、福利、社会保险之类的。
Bill: OK, we will pay insurances for employees after the probationary period.
比尔：好的。在转正之后，公司会为员工缴纳保险。
Jack: What do they include?
Bill: Include endowment insurance, medical insurance, unemployment insurance, work-related injury insurance and maternity insurance.
比尔：包括养老保险、医疗保险、失业保险、工伤保险以及生育保险。
Jack: That sounds great.
Bill: Employees will also have housing payment reserve funds.
比尔：员工也会有住房公积金。
一般企业都会给员工缴纳各项保险，如养老保险、失业保险、工伤保险、医疗保险和生育保险。其中的养老保险、失业保险和医疗保险由企业和个人分别按比例缴纳，而工伤保险和生育保险则完全由企业缴纳。
Bill: Do you have other questions?
比尔：你还有其他问题吗？
Jack: I want to know if the staff can get a vacation every year.

contents.title: 比尔：正式员工每年都可以带薪休假一个月。除此之外，员工还可获得免费旅游的机会。
contents.answer: Bill: The permanent staff can have a paid month-long vacation every year. Besides, they also get chances of free traveling.

contents.content: Jack: That's quite good. Thank you for telling me about those.
如果求职者在面试前可以通过各种途径了解到公司的薪资水平和福利待遇情况固然很好，但是如果不能的话，面试时也要委婉地提出自己对这方面的要求。有时面试官会就这些问题来提问，来考察面试者的情况。此时，一定要沉着冷静，委婉地说出自己的看法和想法。只要做足了准备，以不变应万变，一定能在面试中获胜。
必背例句

contents.title: 除此之外，你可以带薪休假一个月。
contents.answer: Besides, you can have paid leave for one month.

contents.content: 2.I heard that your company will offer very good benefi ts.
我听说贵公司会提供很好的福利。
3.You can enjoy all the benefi ts offered by the company after you become a permanent employee.
成为正式员工之后，你可以享有公司的所有福利待遇。
4.The company pays insurances and house funds for every employee.
公司为每位员工缴纳保险和住房公积金。
5.The company will provide employees with national holidays.
公司为员工提供国家规定的假期。
6.The employers will pay the insurance premiums for their employees.
用人单位会为员工缴纳保险费。
7.Once you are hired, we will offer you insurances according to the relevant laws of the country.
一经录用，我们会按国家相关规定为你缴纳保险。
8.You should enjoy social insurance benefi ts in accordance with Labor Law.
根据劳动法规定，你应该享有社会保险福利。
9.Except the insurances, the company will provide you with free employee meals.
除了保险之外，公司将给你提供免费工作餐。
10.The company offers very good benefi ts, such as education, training, traveling and so on.
公司提供了很好的福利待遇，如教育，培训，旅游等。
核心词汇总
medical insurance 医疗保险
unemployment insurance 失业保险
employment injury insurance 工伤保险
endowment insurance 养老保险
maternity insurance 生育保险
housing payment reserve fund住房公积金
extra health benefi ts 额外的医疗福利
holiday rotation 节假日轮流值班
year-end bonus 年终奖
clock in/out 打卡
unpaid leave 无薪假
casual leave 事假
maternity leave 产假
sick leave 病假
